name: The Clockwork Rogues
description: The Clockwork Rogues represents a unique take on the vastly popular rogue-like genera. The game is a Co-op, rogue-like, twin-stick shooter. Set in a Steampunk Victorian London, the narrative is set in a timeline where Charles Babbage and Ada Lovelace came together to complete their Analytical Engine. This machine sparks a steampunk revolution and changes the course of history. The Analytical Engine is used to create the autonomous clockwork robots the COG Twins. Once they have been created Babbage is kidnapped and forced to create an army of mechanical creatures that have been used to overthrow the London government and hand control to a single man known only as 'The Gentleman'. The Cog twins much fight through procedurally generated  streets of London, with their arsenal of randomly generated weapons to save London and get their creator back.
